{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/title | size}}
{{cpp/utility/basic_stacktrace/navbar}}
{{ddcl | since=c++23 | 1=
size_type size() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the number of entries in the stacktrace.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The number of entries in the stacktrace.

===Complexity===
Constant.

===Example===
{{example
 | The following code uses {{tt|size}} to display the number of entries in the current stacktrace:
 | code=
#include &lt;stacktrace&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
 
int main()
{ 
    auto trace = std::stacktrace::current();
 
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "trace contains " &lt;&lt; trace.size() &lt;&lt; " entries.\n";
}
 | p=true
 | output=
trace contains 3 entries.
}}
